meta.description: Determine the number of pills to minimize discharge while meeting medication requirements.

sets.name: PILLS
sets.description: Types of pills available for the patient.

params.name: pain_medication
params.description: Units of pain medication provided per pill.

params.name: anxiety_medication
params.description: Units of anxiety medication provided per pill.

params.name: discharge
params.description: Units of discharge caused per pill.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of pills of each type to be given to the patient.

objective.name: min_total_discharge
objective.expr: sum(discharge[p] * x[p] for p in PILLS)
objective.description: Minimize the total discharge caused by the pills.

constraints.name: pain_medication_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(pain_medication[p] * x[p] for p in PILLS)
constraints.description: Total pain medication provided must not exceed 6 units.

constraints.name: anxiety_medication_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(anxiety_medication[p] * x[p] for p in PILLS)
constraints.description: Total anxiety medication provided must be at least 3 units.
